pages.text: The 'heart' of a Vagrant emits a special resonance which, while weak, can be tracked from vast distances. This is done using a Vagrant Divining Rod, which can be fashioned from various Overworld and Nether materials.

The device will emit a spray of mist in the direction of said Vagrant, which can then be used to follow them. Be warned, though, as not only are Vagrants extremely dangerous, but they will likely notice being tracked.
